forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High near 20C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 68F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 20C. NE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.
